> <OLD>
>
> "Maybe they know something that we ignore" muttered Hydras in a groomy way

<NEW>

"You think?" JHIAXUS said as he flew the ship, angling it as best he
could through the laser fire as the broken landscape beneath them flew
quickly by. The sky was dark and grim and it seemed as if there were
mountains all around them and this place was in some dark valley.

Meanwhile three more hovertanks moved out and began firing also at the
ship and three jets took off coming in the direction of the shuttle.

"I don't think I can fly us through all that!" JHIAXUS said as the
ship rocked under the increased firepower that was being used against
them.

SCORPONOK sat down in one of the other chairs and assisted as a
copilot. "Only you have a true flight mode Jhiaxus." He said, "but I
don't you could get through that on your own."

There was a nod from JHIAXUS, "We may need to pull back until we can
figure out how to get through that."

SCORPONOK pointed at the large glowing sphere that sat on the large
tower, the very place that this shuttle seemed intent on taking
them"That? We don't even know what that is."

JHIAXUS gaped as he looked down at his sensor reading, "It is not
registering properly on my scanners. I am getting a lot of neutrino,
temporal and gravitational distortions from it!" He said as he quickly
banked his ship away!

SCORPONOK glanced back at HYDRAS, "You have always been so quick to
take over, do you have any suggestions?"

(TAG)

- Preston
